snippet.title: Borstal - gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Borstal: survival-roguelike novellas. 
Available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/453730/

There are two scenarios currently: first one is set on a small island. It's 1926, you're 13 years old and it is raining. 
The second scenario puts you in the role of a mountaineer trying to climb an eight-thousander. 

The game is moddable, you can create your own scenarios. I'm planning to integrate it with Steam Workshop later, so you could download and play scenarios made by others!
